You don't have to break the link in to sub-string, it can be greater than 73 characters each line. Please refer to https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/dbus-sensors/+/67653 for more information
Updated. Thank you.

Please add the result of this command
`busctl get-property xyz.openbmc_project.IntrusionSensor /xyz/openbmc_project/Chassis/Intrusion xyz.openbmc_project.Association.Definitions Associations`
Done
I think you should define a variable for this object path
Done
Missing remove mAssocIface in the de-constructor
Done
It seems the intfPath is not a correct name, could you update it?
I name it with a reference to other sensors but it really does not sound right. Changed to "confPath" as the sensor.hpp file uses "configurationPath".
LGTM
Friendly ping. Hi, can this somehow continue so I can proceed with my bmcweb patch that needs this?
LGTM - leave it up for couple days to see if there is any additional comments. If, not, i will give +2 and merge

should be lower case and not hardcoded?

/xyz/openbmc_project/Chassis isn't a valid namespace?

Hi, I have added another patch in this chain to address this (https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/dbus-sensors/+/76254). The object path will be "/xyz/openbmc_project/chassis/" + <sensor_name>; <sensor_name> will be the value of the "Name" property from Entity-Manager configuration. This patch has also been updated accordingly. Please help check it out. Thanks.

Good catch. 
Will review fix in https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/dbus-sensors/+/76254
